AAG Cloud Watcher INDI Driver v1.3

A INDI driver for the AAG Cloud Watcher (AAGware - http://www.aagware.eu/)

  Copyright (C) 2012-2015 Sergio Alonso (zerjioi@ugr.es)
  
  Anemometer code contributed by Joao Bento.


Version 1.3

  + Support for the optional anemometer in newer models.
  
  
Version 1.2

  + Moved to INDI 3rdparty source tree and updated to INDI Library 0.9.7
  
  
Version 1.1:

  + Updated to work with latest INDI Library 0.9.5 (thanks to Francesc Baldr√≠s
    for the bug notification)
